DescriptionData.Title: AJs 16" Striped Arm Warmers
DescriptionData.Description:
These striped arm warmers are perfect for teams or any dance group that needs an easy uniform accessory. They are also a nice fashion statement for anyone, and will keep you warm. They are stretchy enough to be comfortable, but have enough elastic in them to keep them in place.
These Arm warmers are made from 91% acrylic and 9% elastic. Can be worn as Arm Warmers or small Leg Warmers.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: 16 inches long, can be worn as an Arm Warmer or a small Leg Warmer
